definitions.definition: One who does not contribute or pay appropriately; one who gets a free ride , etc. without paying a fair share .
A person who takes expired unsold merchandise from the back of supermarket premises .

main_definition: ( colloquial ) One who does not contribute or pay appropriately; one who gets a free ride , etc. without paying a fair share .
secondary_definitions: ( UK , New Zealand , Canada ) A person who takes expired unsold merchandise from the back of supermarket premises .
